survey_name: Online Learning Platform User Experience Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of online learning platforms to understand their experiences, preferences, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: Which online learning platform(s) do you currently use?
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture usage across platforms. Include an 'Other' option for platforms not listed.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Ensure 'Other' option includes a text input field.

script.question_text: Which online learning platform(s) do you currently use?

questions.question_text: How often do you use online learning platforms?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How often do you use online learning platforms?

questions.question_text: What is your primary reason for using online learning platforms?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question with an 'Other' option to capture unique reasons.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE). Include text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is your primary reason for using online learning platforms?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the course content quality on the platform(s) you use?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the course content quality on the platform(s) you use?

questions.question_text: What features do you value the most in an online learning platform? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Limit selections to 3 to prioritize top features. Include an 'Other' option.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with max selections set to 3. Include text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What features do you value the most in an online learning platform? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the platform(s) you use to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard NPS-like scale for measuring recommendation likelihood.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the platform(s) you use to others?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the platform(s) you use?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the platform(s) you use?

questions.question_text: Do you prefer self-paced courses or instructor-led courses?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to understand learning preferences.

script.question_text: Do you prefer self-paced courses or instructor-led courses?

questions.question_text: How important is the availability of certifications or credentials to you?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure importance. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How important is the availability of certifications or credentials to you?

questions.question_text: What is the biggest challenge you face when using online learning platforms?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to identify pain points. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What is the biggest challenge you face when using online learning platforms?
